noteR.para: Before carrying out any operation on a vehicle fitted with the Stop & Start system, always follow the safety instructions vehicle : precautions for the repairGIEMR-002446
Consult the safety and cleanliness advice and operation recommendations before carrying out any repairpassenger compartment cooling assembly : precautions for the repairGIEMR-001022.
Consult the device's operating manual to avoid incorrect use.
To avoid damaging the cold loop components (corrosions, etc.), do not use dye if the traces reveal that some product has already been injected.
A summary table gives the quantities of refrigerant in the system according to the engine typepassenger compartment cooling assembly : parts and consumables for the repairGIEMR-001021.

After any work involving leaks on the air conditioning circuit on a Laguna II, Vel Satis and Espace IV, make sure there are no "Refrigerant DF033" fill faults using theDiagnostic tool. If one appears, clear it. The compressor cannot operate until the fault is cleared.

ul.li: If the air conditioning circuit is fitted with a single filler valve, some filling equipment only requires the use of the high pressure pipe (refer to the filling station instructions).
Depending on the situation, run the system for a few minutes before recovering the coolant to improve drainage.

noteR.para: It is essential to follow these procedures to prevent:
- gas escaping when the circuit is opened,
- pollution of the environment through the release of gas into the atmosphere when the circuit is opened or when a vacuum is created.
Risks of serious burns or electric shocks that may prove fatal.

Before carrying out any work on the vehicle, it is essential that you follow the instructions regarding vehicle lockout. This work must be carried out by an employee who is qualified and authorised to work on a high-voltage onboard networkvehicle : precautions for the repairGIEMR-002446.

procstep.para: Lock out the 12 V supply circuit to disable the programming of the remote air conditioning12 V supply circuit : lockout - removal of lockoutGIEMR-000508.
When draining or checking the refrigerant fill load, three scenarios are to be taken into account:

ul.li: the engine is running and the air conditioning is in operation (A),
the engine is running but the air conditioning is not in operation (B),
the engine is not running nor is the air conditioning in operation (C).
Operate the air conditioning until the cooling fan assembly is triggered twice,
Switch off the engine,
drain for the first time (note down the original value),
wait15 minutes,
check that the relative pressure is no more than0 bar,
repeat the cycles until the relative pressure is equal to or less than0 bar,
add together the values of the various draining operations; the fill is confirmed as being correct if the volume of refrigerant fluid is the specified fill + 35 g or - 100 g .
run the engine until the cooling fan is triggered twice,
Switch off the engine,
drain for the first time (note down the value),
wait15 minutes,
run the engine until the cooling fan is triggered twice,
Switch off the engine,
drain for the second time (note down the value),
repeat the cycles until the relative pressure is equal to or less than0 bar,
add together the values of the various draining operations; the fill is confirmed as being correct if the volume of refrigerant fluid is the specified fill + 35 g or - 100 g .
drain for the first time (note down the value),
wait2 hours,
repeat the cycles until the relative pressure is equal to or less than0 bar,
add together the values of the various draining operations; the fill is confirmed as being correct if the volume of refrigerant fluid is the specified fill + 35 g or - 100 g .

procstep.para: It is essential to carry out vacuum extraction correctly before loading, otherwise the air conditioning will not work properly.
There are two scenarios to consider:

ul.li: vacuum created immediately after discharge (scenario A),
vacuum created after an interval of several hours or days (scenario B).
creation of a vacuum takes20 minutes.
during creation of a vacuum it takes 45 minutes to eliminate any trace of moisture.

procstep.para: Test the seal once the vacuum has been created (some stations do this automatically).
Fill the refrigerant circuit using therefrigerant charging station.
Top up the oil with the recommended type and volume of oil and refrigerant, depending on the work carried outpassenger compartment cooling assembly : parts and consumables for the repairGIEMR-001021.
Remove the lockout of the 12 V supply circuit 12 V supply circuit : lockout - removal of lockoutGIEMR-000508.
Ensure that there are no leaks using the electronic detector refrigerant circuit : checkGIEMR-000518.

noteR.para: After injecting dye into the refrigerant, be sure to indicate this on a label (supplied with the dye capsule), and the date of the operation.
Position the label so it is visible near to the cold loop filler valve.

procstep.para: Check that the air conditioning system is operating correctlypassenger compartment cooling assembly : checkGIEMR-001019.
